name: HIS_TYP_CARC_SALIV
description: Stores data for College of American Pathologists (CAP) form field Histologic Type - Carcinomas of minor salivary glands.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the result record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Histologic Type - Carcinomas of minor salivary glands.
entries: Carcinoma ex pleomorphic adenoma (malignant mixed tumor)
